includes/utf8.h File Reference

Implementation of UTF-8 charset encoding (RFC3629). More...

#include <sys/types.h>
#include <wchar.h>

Go to the source code of this file.

Defines

#define UTF8_IGNORE_ERROR   0x01
 Set flag to ignore all errors.
#define UTF8_SKIP_BOM   0x02
 Set flag to skip processing the Byte Order Mark.

Detailed Description

Implementation of UTF-8 charset encoding (RFC3629).

Author:
Alexey Vatchenko

Function Documentation

size_t utf8_to_wchar ( const char *  in,
size_t  insize,
wchar_t *  out,
size_t  outsize,
int  flags 
)

Converts a bytestream of utf8 data to wchar_t.

Parameters:
[in] in The utf8 bytestream
insize The size of the utf8 bytestream
[out] out A wchar_t buffer to write to
outsize The size of the wchar_t buffer
flags Optional flags to control (see UTF-8 function flags utf8flags)
Returns:
The number of characters written to out. Returns 0 on error.

size_t wchar_to_utf8 ( const wchar_t *  in,
size_t  insize,
char *  out,
size_t  outsize,
int  flags 
)

Converts a wchar_t buffer to a utf8 bytestream.

Parameters:
[in] in The wchar_t buffer to convert
insize The size of the wchar_t buffer
[out] out A utf-8 bytestream buffer
outsize The size of the utf-8 bytestream buffer
flags Optional flags to control (see UTF-8 function flags utf8flags)
Returns:
The size of the result buffer in bytes. 0 on error.
